page.title: 09HEALTH CARE NE. PLYMOUTH
page.content: {HOSPITALS:Derriford}Plymouth District. PH P777111.Opened 1981.Accident/Emerg. open 1987.350 beds,12 wards.Completion 1992,1000 beds.Open visiting 10am_8pm. {Nuffield}(Private)Derriford Road Ph P_ 775861.Opened 1971.48 beds.40 admiss. weekly.Open visiting 11am_1pm,3pm_9pm. {RESIDENTIAL HOMES:Rowans.}Derriford Rd Ph P 792086 For 12 disabled patients. 14 Short stay patients:holidays / rehabilitation. {Heathfeild}Looseleigh Lane.Ph P 77280 National Health Old Peoples Home. 20 Residents.{ {Torr Home For the Blind}Hartley ph.p_ 771710. {HEALTH CENTRE:Estover,}Leypark Dr. Group practice:6 Doctors.3 Individual practices.3 Health visitors.Dentist ,weekly Social Worker,Chiropodist 2x week.School Health alt.Tues.Family Planning 2x month Ph P 788411.
